column17:
From the house of Strollay this saree in purple colour is abstract printed all over. The saree has been crafted with high quality georgette and features yellow borders on all sides.

Features
  • Brand: Strollay
  • Category: Traditional and Ethnic Wear
  • Type: Sarees
  • Fabric: Georgette
  • Colour:Purple Yellow
  • Saree Length (in mts.): 5.4
  • Blouse Length (in mts.): 0.80

Wash & Care
Wash it with a mild detergent.
If washing in a machine set it on a delicate mode and low temperature cycle.
Wash dark colours separately and use iron at low temperature.
